readable.title: 2998277360_9b4c0192f1
readable.content: A man in a yellow slicker holds a sign saying " down and out " . An elderly lady in a yellow raincoat is sitting by a white building , holding up a cardboard sign to a car driving by . Elderly woman in yellow parka pan handling Man with a yellow coat and a cardboard sign . Older woman in yellow jacket , holds sign saying " DOWN AND OUT " in urban area .
